title: Affordale Housing Micro Lofts_Only Two Available
map_address: 711 Catherine Street SW near Mayland Ave
posting_body: The Academy Lofts is a preservation & adaptive reuse project in an historic elementary school near The Atlanta Beltline offering 35 Residential Micro-units.
Micro-units offer central AC, large windows with incredible light, appliances included, onsite laundry, and limited onsite parking ($50 monthly fee).
Coming Soon will be a coffee house on-site.
The application fee is $35 and monthly rent is $906.00.
Please be advised that this is an affordable housing unit, and the annual income requirement is $26,040-$36,240.
You must not exceed $36,240 and we cannot accept any active students.
Management will also run a credit/criminal check and one month's rent is required upon approval.
for an application link and/or more details....
